contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We recognize the importance of staying updated with rapid changes in financial markets
contact.discover: Discover the latest gold prices moment by moment
contact.description: Live Gold is the ideal choice for providing accurate and instant information about gold prices in Saudi Riyal, making it easier for traders and investors in the Kingdom to follow the local market. We also provide gold prices in dollars to follow the global market.
contact.help: Looking for help? Fill out the form and start a new adventure.
contact.assistance: We're here to help! If you have any inquiries or need support, don't hesitate to contact us. Our team is ready to answer all your questions and provide the assistance you need.

card1.title: Safe buying and selling between individuals and merchants
card1.desc: A trusted C2C platform that makes buying and selling gold easy — with merchant accounts, strict verification, user ratings, and secure online payment options.

card2.title: Accurate real-time prices
card2.desc: We provide instant updates for gold and precious metals prices from reliable sources, with simplified charts to help users understand market movements.

card3.title: Professional online auctions
card3.desc: Join organized auctions on gold and jewelry with clear timers, instant notifications, and technical support to ensure a fair and secure experience.

card4.title: Dedicated support & continuous follow-up
card4.desc: A dedicated support team ready to help and respond to your inquiries around the clock.
